detail_desc: Lightly padded waist bag in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the front and an adjustable waistband that can be both tied and fastened with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 4.5x14x30 cm.
Sun visor in braided straw with a wide band in a contrasting colour that ties at the back. Concealed elastication at the back.

Calf-length dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening at the top and frilled collar with ties at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist and hem. Jersey lining.
5-pocket shorts in washed, superstretch denim with embroidered appliqués and a print motif. Adjustable elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck and button placket.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with appliqués at the front and hook and loop tab over the foot. Patterned soles.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front and a strap over the foot. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight-cut blouse in a soft weave with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and front pockets.

Lace bras with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Wide adjustable shoulder straps and a slightly wider fastener at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Sports set with a sports top and pair of sports shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and elasticated hems. Slim Fit.

Bra top in microfibre with a lined front, wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. No fasteners.
Short, fitted dress with a deep V-neck, concealed zip at the back, half-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, A-line skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and decorative seams front and back.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in lace with a skirt in a pleated weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with an overlocked hem. Partly lined.
Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose. V-neck with a knot detail at the front, an elasticated seam at the back of the waist, and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Top in soft, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and ribbed cuffs.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Large, boxy beach bag in patterned cotton twill with a soft base and two handles that double up as shoulder straps. Size approx. 19x35x36x50 cm.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, low crotch and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey in various colours with various prints.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Long-sleeved top in a fine knit with smocked seams.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cotton flannel shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with buttoned slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless playsuit in soft cotton jersey. Elastication at the top and a flounce at the front that continues over one shoulder and a shoulder strap on the other shoulder. Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative, tasselled bow at the front, and side pockets. Unlined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Court shoes with pointed toes and a bow on the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Slippers in soft fabric with a bow at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles, and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Playsuit in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline, short, flounced sleeves, press-studs at the back and elastication at the waist and hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1½-4Y).
Boxy-style T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Knee-length skirt in a stretch weave with a subtle herringbone pattern. Concealed zip and a slit at the back. Lined.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, details on the shoulders and short cap sleeves. Buttons down the front, elastication at the back of the waist, and a sewn-on tie belt. Satin lining.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere with a roll-edge neckline and long, wide sleeves.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.
Plastic bucket in a spooky shape with a handle at the top.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. No buttons.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and straight legs with a frill trim at the hems.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a gathered skirt.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
Blouse in a narrow-striped cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a wide flounce at the hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.
Short shorts that can be worn as a skirt in an airy weave. Covered elastication at the back of the waist, a flounce-trimmed, double-layered front section and a decorative bow at the waist.
Top in a relaxed fit with long dolman sleeves.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores at the sides, a loop at the back and an elasticated strap with a metal buckle at the top. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4.5 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in a viscose weave with a gently tapered waist, narrow turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in a viscose weave. Wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and wide ties at the waist. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim. Cut-out section at the front and a skirt with narrow elastication at the waist and a shorter tier layered over the top. Unlined.
Scarf in soft fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Top in soft jersey with a round neckline, short cap sleeves and a lace trim at the hem.
Blouse in an airy, crinkled viscose and modal weave with a frill-trimmed neckline that has an opening and ties at the front and a yoke with a frill trim. Short, wide raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Text print on one leg and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

Fitted, calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a frill trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck at the back with lacing at the top. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and flared skirt. Unlined.

Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections and reflective details. Hood and zip at the top, and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Seamless.
5-pocket washed denim jeans in a slightly looser fit with embroidered details, a regular waist, slightly lower crotch, and zip fly and button. Tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of joggers in soft, jacquard-knit cotton. Jumper with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Set with a pre-tied bow tie and a patterned handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2x-12xY), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
